channel.title: CVE Feed for Web-X -- Be POPIA Compliant

item.title: CVE-2022-47445|2024-08-03T14:55:07.974Z -- web-x -- be%20popia%20compliant
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Web-X Be POPIA Compliant be-popia-compliant allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Be POPIA Compliant: from n/a through 1.2.0.
